basics.name: Thomas Jacobs
basics.label: Software Engineer, Computer Scientist
basics.summary: A German-born theoretical physicist, widely ranked among the greatest and most influential scientists of all time

work.name: Alarming Ladder
work.summary: During my contract at Alarming Ladder, I specialised in network programming for a key project, using C# to develop the system that relayed in-game information between clients.

work.name: Cycle Revolution
work.summary: While pursuing my MSc in Computer Science, I worked part-time at Thomas Cycle Revolution, where I assisted with daily sales, bike maintenance, and assembly.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
